welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kiziltepe, Turkey! Experience the charm of our bustling bazaar, rich history, and warm hospitality as you explore our city. We invite you to relax, indulge in local cuisine, and soak up the vibrant culture Kiziltepe has to offer.

restaurants.name: Has Simit Çarşı
restaurants.description: Has Simit Çarşı is a café located in Kızıltepe.

restaurants.name: Ciğerci Fuat Usta
restaurants.description: Ciğerci Fuat Usta is a steakhouse located in Kızıltepe.

restaurants.description: Keyfi Mersin Tantuni is a tantuni restaurant located in Mardin.

restaurants.description: Friend's Joy Coffee is a café located in Kızıltepe.

restaurants.name: Mila Cafe & Restaurant
restaurants.description: Mila Cafe & Restaurant is a café located in Kızıltepe.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mardin Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Mardin Airport is reserved for special guests and provides luxurious amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
